source_objects.description: Learn the XYZ of 3D and animation design using Autodesk Maya, Revit, Adobe After Effects, and more.

items.title: Learn After Effects from Scratch [Fresh]
items.headline: And build awesome motion graphics compositions
objectives_summary: You will learn how to create Motion Graphics and and other animations in After Effects.
You will learn how to create Pie chart, Color Mask, Map Animation and much more.
You will learn about writing various Expressions to control motion graphics, where you will learn to control properties by writing code.

items.title: Cinema 4D - Basic Course Vol.1
items.headline: How to realize an animated video by Cinema 4D, Mudbox, Photoshop, After Effects and Premiere
objectives_summary: To pass throught all the main production phases to realize an animated video in 3D graphics.
To create from scratch simple objects, animate them and make a final rendering.
To build a motion graphics product by using different softwares together, acquiring so the typical production workflows.
